speaker: Madeline
text: A journey across dimensions where two lovers may finally fulfill their destiny. The red hot passion of becoming one! I will ignore my heart no longer! Indulge in temptation. Give in to desire. We are but her loyal disciples, giving into their wicked bliss.

speaker: Madeline
text: Mere stepping stones to see their eternal paradise come to life! The pests want to put a wrench in our plan, in her perfect vision. They must be stopped at all costs, for it is my sworn duty as her number one follower!

speaker: Dizzy
text: Eternal paradise...? Can we just talk this through? I don’t want anyone else to get hurt!

speaker: Ashe
text: Dizzy, I think we have no choice. I’m sorry...

speaker: Terra
text: An eternal paradise built on desire... on the Cosmic Express? I have SO many questions...

speaker: Madeline
text: And then the pests make an appearance... No time for talking! Your lives end today.
